website_summaries.verdict: The Soundfreaq Sound Kick portable Bluetooth speaker is a good value, with an attractive design and good performance for its size.
pros: The Soundfreaq Sound Kick SFQ-04 is a compact, attractively designed portable Bluetooth speaker that sounds decent and plays loud for its size
It has a built-in rechargeable battery that delivers 7 hours of play time, and a USB port for charging smartphones and portable devices
cons: The speaker's sound is a little thin, and there isn't a speakerphone capability
Its retractable Xkick bass chamber converts into a stand that's nifty but a little wobbly
While portable, the Sound Kick is bigger than some other small Bluetooth speakers in the same price range

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best portable speaker I've had (over 30 owned so far), without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for two years now. Leaving in sea side Acapulco, I don't expect any appliance to work perfectly for too long. Well... this is. It sounds really loud and clear, and pairing with my iPhone 6s is frustration free. After two years, if I had to buy another portable speaker, would be this, even over a Bose, not only beacuase I consider it's as good, but becouse is that good at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F. Aguilar Espaa

customer_reviews.title: ... and awards made me believe this would be a great portable speaker to use for someone with hearing loss ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon and published reviews and awards made me believe this would be a great portable speaker to use for someone with hearing loss but when it arrived and I listened to it the volume was very weak. I also found it on sale in target stores for $30 less than I had paid on Amazon. In the end I went to a store to listen to various speakers back to back and chose a small Sony unit for it's impressive volume but not excessive bass and much smaller size...for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Craig

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a wallop of sound. Ours is well-traveled and is still working well. It has a home, and gets it's charge in the bathroom for shower music, it has been on bike and stroller rides, down by the river, out by the trampoline quite a bit, and many other places just humming along and belting out whatever music we throw at it. Also makes a good speaker system when playing movies on a projector or iPad. So versatile, rich sounding and just loud enough that it has to be turned down occasionally! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker about 3 years ago and I swear it's been through hell. It's been left outside after several house parties in the humid south louisiana weather several times and my wife had thrown it at me before, yet it just won't die! Most of the time it stays in the bathroom for shower tunes so you know it gets all that moisture. It's a good though speaker that holds a charge very well. It has great bass and if you don't want bass just hit the UGB. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: BRYANT

customer_reviews.title: Technically very good, sound quality not so much
customer_reviews.text: Technically, the speaker works great, it paired with my daughter's iPhone very easily, with no hiccups. That was the good part. The sound would probably be OK for someone who isn't terribly picky (old folks), but since there's no way to adjust the sound other than with the connected device, it's not a good choice for someone who likes to listen to music at higher volumes or punch up the bass (the average 14 year old).
customer_reviews.author: jjambro

customer_reviews.title: GO FREAQ!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a speaker oddessy.....Looking for a good sounding speaker for my iphone4s and ipad 4.....Good sound not too expensive and portable....This one is a delightful surprise......It pairs easily (I usually have to call Apple)...has good sound....There is only one drawback.....when I pull out the speaker from the back....it falls over easily(?)....but a tube of lipstick will keep it upright and in place. I wanted this for ease of use and sound....I would recommend.....even with this flaw.....OR I am doing something wrong??...any advice would be appreciated. It looks in the picture like it will stand by itself but mine does stand up by itself.....It still sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good... Speaker sound is nice, looks nice, not cheesy like a similarly priced other brand. Just remember to pull out the area in the back for the speaker to be able to turn on. After the first use, I forgot and thought it was broken. Like the case for the speaker too. Nice touch. I didn't have any issues with the volume of the music when on battery. So far, very glad I purchased for the bf for Xmas. Saved about $50 and I think this was the better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle L Marker

customer_reviews.title: Easily paired with my Android devices
customer_reviews.text: Charged it overnight (the green LED comes on at the power jack when it's charged, red when batteries are low). Paired seamlessly with my Android devices; an older tablet, a new tablet and a newer phone. Sound quality is good with more than adequate volume for my use (background music in a 1,000sf work area). Small enough to be out of the way yet big enough to get good sound range.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Tim

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I am a true audiophile but have no system to take with me except headphones. This system sure beats headphones! Sounds beautiful at ANY volume, great bass, easy pairing. They have used a very powerful CMOY amp in here whilst maintaining a folding design to allow for a Bose-like folding bass labyrinth. AWESOME. One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon...ever.
customer_reviews.author: DocRon

customer_reviews.title: Delivers great sound for its size
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit for work. This bluetooth speaker is light and compact and fits in my suitcase. I sometimes bring it in my backpack as a carry on. I stream mostly jazz music from my iPad or Samsung Galaxy S3 phone. It is great for playing Pandora music as well. The bass quality is excellent for its size. It fills my hotel room quite nicely and I can feel the bass. I love that it works when plugged or unplugged. I oftentimes unplug it and port it to the bathroom when showering. If you place it on the floor of the bathroom it delivers very nice bass.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for its price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical on how good a $100 speaker would sound compared to both the $200 Jawbone Jambox and the $300 Bose Soundlink. It actually sounded considerably better than the Jambox but not quite as good as the Bose Soundlink. I was very impressed with its performance and I was able to pair it with my Droid X2, iTouch 4, and my laptop with no problems. This is a very balanced, clear sounding speaker almost as good as the Bose Soundlink, the bass was not as deep. Other than that I am glad with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pagay

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these....
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bose on the main floor of my house but I wanted something for upstairs. I got this little guy after reading the reviews. I liked mine so much I bought one for my husband to take to his office. Do not expect Bose quality.....especially on bass sounds....but if you need something for an office or large room....it sounds great.....it is not have full house coverage but it sounds great on the deck or a single room. Which is exactly what I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Outdated app.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and worked great on my old iPhone 5. I now have an iPhone 6, and the app has not been updated yet to work with the new phone. Contacted sound freak about an update, no response.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love it works awesome with my android phone and my computer its loud and sound very good, but has even bigger sound when its plugged in to a outlet. and its portable Im very happy with this purchase. PRO's Portable USB Charger Clear and loud sound from small package bluetooth only thing I would have liked to see would be a headphone jack I think thats the only thing missing from this little system
customer_reviews.author: NUSA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound, especially when plugged in
customer_reviews.text: When you unplug the unit, the volume (and particularly the bass) are only "really good". But when the unit is plugged into AC power, it's as loud and clear as you could possibly want. The BlueTooth connectivity simply *works*, which is something you don't always encounter. (I have a car stereo several times more expensive that seems to have far more difficulty switching between sources than the SoundKick does.) I'll very probably be buying these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Started off great but then it kept shutting itself off
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this I was so happy, it worked super well and sounded better than most bluetooth speakers on the market. However, I've had it about a month and started noticing that it kept shutting off after about 20 minutes of play regardless of whether it was plugged in or working wirelessly. And it didn't matter what I did, it just keeps shutting off. I'm annoyed but going to buy another unit that will hopefully not have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cavera

customer_reviews.title: clear but not loud
customer_reviews.text: I got mine refurbished but its not that loud. Am I doing something wrong? I had a smaller soundfreaq that lasted several years and it was alot louder than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: F. Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Blue(tooth) Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound and battery life from a device this small. Bluetooth pairing is almost instantaneous. Playback is without pauses or drop-out - even when my phone is 20 -25 feet away. No, this is NOT an audiophile's dream, but it is a great portable and bedroom solution. It cranks out sound so that it can be heard in a large room.
customer_reviews.author: davyboy

customer_reviews.title: Suits me needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this remote speaker. I used an Anycom speaker for a few years but always seemed to have trouble with it staying connected to my computer. When I upgraded to Windows 8 it was really terrible. So I took a chance and bought this one and voila! it's perfect! I love it. I am a avid audio book fan and this Bluetooth resolved all my issues. I only wish I could have a second one operating off in another room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Jaros

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the small jawbone jambox. However, I have a much smaller Rocksteady that just amazes me! If you want to save space and still need clear, crisp, beautiful, loud sound, I would get the Rocksteady bluetooth speaker. That is not to say that you can go wrong with this one--it too has great sound and is quite remarkable for its size. I think they are both in the same price range. I think Target displays each of them so you can test them out. The very best out there is the Large Jawbone Jambox, which isn't all that big. I own it too, and it tops them all!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wollman

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she just loves it. The sound on it is wonderful and I couldn't believe it when I heard how crisp and clear it was. I know she really enjoys it a lot and that makes me happy! The price was great and that's wonderful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Loud for a little guy. I was so pleased. Not too complicated. Pairs seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact speaker
customer_reviews.text: It does have great sound, and having bluetooth is nice. It is also very compact and comes with a nice case, although the case doesn't hold the accessories. The fact that it tilts back on itself to stand makes it wobbly. I have the logitec equivalent speaker without bluetooth. If I could do it all over again, I would buy another logitech "with" bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: dirtydug

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife. She uses her Ipad for everything nowadays. Listening to web broadcasts is very important to her. I was delighted when she opened the gift and loved the idea. Listening through the Sound Freaq was even better. Obviously rap music would be a poor match to this little jewel but much music and all of her webcasts sound very good indeed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: All the great reviews were spot on with this small and powerful bluetooth speaker. This thing sounds great and has surprisingly solid, low end bass. Spend the extra money, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect exactly what I wanted and as loud as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect exactly what I wanted and as loud as I need it to be for everyday! I live in a 2 bedroom apartment and the sound On full blast is heard throughout my whole place and outside
customer_reviews.author: ConsciousCat

customer_reviews.title: Better speakers out there for less money
customer_reviews.text: It's not as loud as I'd hoped. It is louder if it's connected via an auxiliary cable but that defeats the point of bluetooth. Plus there's a design flaw where the back has to be pulled out for it to stay on. Well, it sometimes gets shifted and it rocks back on itself, collapsing the back. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen j

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Not loud enough for me and it doesn't really sound that good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and a huge surprise value.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a pleasant surprise. I have always had an affinity for underdogs! This is an excellent value. $99, better than some that are a lot more expensive. Would definitely recommend this to a friend or family.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful small portable bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: For the size, this speaker sounds outstanding. It does not get as loud as others I've had, but gets loud enough, especially when plugged into power. The battery lasts a long time, and makes the speakers incredibly convenient to use. Everyone who has seen this speaker as wanted one. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The Soundfreaq Bluetooth Speaker got four stars for the price, easy hookup and connection. The speaker lack bass sound quality as compared to another wireless speaker (Logitech). Works perfectly with our iPhone and iPad. It is portable and plays on one charge for about 6plus hours. It's a good speaker.
customer_reviews.author: KMax

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made in a long time!! Well packaged, arrived fast. Sounds great! Sturdy casing makes it a dream for outdoors or on your kitchen counter. Easy to use and connects fast. Would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say that I was very satisfied with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid music listener, I must say that I was very satisfied with the quality of this product. I have not owned a Bluetooth speaker before this one, so I cannot compare it to any of the others, but as far as sound quality, this product is excellent for the price. Bass is sufficient, though not exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F. Hendrick IV

customer_reviews.title: very happy camper
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is very powerful and has great sound. I didn't read the instructions and was about to return it as defective when it stopped working. I forgot to recharge the battery. duhhh. Very happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: The Learner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Bought a refurbished unit and really like it for the price. Three months later I realized that it only works in plug-in mode. Decided to try and see what Soundfreaq could do for me. They said just send it in and they would replace it with another refurbished unit. Well to my surpise they sent me a brand new one. Service was quick and courteous. A great company with a great product. Thanks Soundfreak!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Belliveau

customer_reviews.title: Sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Sound good for $100 bluetooth speaker. My friend listen to it and he would like to buy one for himself. My other friend convince me to buy a Bose sound like $200 i love Bose speaker but compare the price and quality Soundfreaq fit budget.
customer_reviews.author: NARONGRAT S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless Speakers Under $100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Soundfreaq SFQ-04 after reading numerous positive reviews, and the reviews were right on. I use bluetooth to play songs from a Nexus 7, and use the Aux port to play from a laptop. The sound quality is great and the base is good. There is a small but noticeable difference in the sound volume when it is not plugged into the wall. The sound volume is not loud enough that it will blast music into the next room, but it still gets 5 stars because if you want to be able to have very loud music in multiple rooms you will probably need to spend considerably more.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok
customer_reviews.text: About what I expected for the price. Sound quality about as good as my Motorola ROKR EQ7 with four JBL speakers. The ROKR sounded very good but had to replace. You can get a better deal by buying directly through Soundfreaq. Not sure what's up with prime prices be jacked up above retail. Not really a good deal is it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, great sound and nice size. Keeps it's charge for a while. I'd definitely buy another for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannemax

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy more as a gifts! What a steal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. Easy to use & great sound. Fast shipping and great packaging. Bluetooth connection was so easy. Everything you need is included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateladyNY

customer_reviews.title: Sound is ok Bass is? (Not so great) Volume ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok Bass is ? (Not so great) Volume doubles when plugged in. Not too impressive with battery power.
customer_reviews.author: KennyB

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the price. It gets even better if you put it on a boxed shelf or at the corner of the wall. The pair key is very convenient. Unfortunatelly it uses a 9V DC charger and not a standard USB cable to charge it. Although it's a very good product I bought a Sound Spot too and now I thing it's a better deal to spend more 40 bucks and buy two Sound Spots (they can be daisy chained) instead of one Sound Kick so you will have a more versatile combination. But any of the choices will be a safe bet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this speaker system. I purchased it for the kitchen when I cook. The unit has two different settings, I'm guessing to act like a loud button. It works great in an enclosed setting, but I don't think its loud enough to take outside.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Its okay for an intimate group setting
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it does not have as much boost power as I had hoped for. Once people are interacting and playing games, even at maximum sound capacity, it is drowned out.
customer_reviews.author: kajnsuga

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: My Son owns one already, the sound quality is very impressive for the size. No problems with syncing Bluetooth. A few years outdated but still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RktRch

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, including bass. Easy to handle and will set up or lay down. I take it to the beach and it works well. My 28 year old daughter even approved!
customer_reviews.author: ColoSkier

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with some reviewers who rate this up there with Bose. I do not think it meets that sound quality. However, it is excellent and especially so for the money. The bluetooth capability is very good and easy to sinc. I use it primarily to listen to Pandora radio and love that I can move it anywhere inside or outside the house. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love the Soundfreaq Sound Kick, great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked as hoped for. I did find that you must carefully check your laptop settings to ensure not just that the Soundfreaq Sound Kick is linked, but that the laptop audio controls are set to "external sound" or "external speakers". That took me awhile to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan T

customer_reviews.title: Competent but doesn't shine
customer_reviews.text: Competent ...but top end volume/bass lacking compared to others I've had. Control Bottons for give no feedback.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Baze

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I own 2. I haven't purchased any other models or brands but I have been very pleased with this speaker so far. It's distortion free enough for some casual listening and gets loud enough for me to use at work (I work in a busy Bakery, not airport loud but all of my equipment is noisy and my friends jawbone speaker didn't hack it). I've been pleased. Note that if you have eq on your phone, I recommend using that in place of the unit's sound boost setting. It actually isn't bad, but I find that at the loudest setting it can distort before the phone eq does.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Foote

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to listen to music and pod casts but I just wish when it's not connected to power that the volume could go louder. Sound is crisp and clear with no no cutting out, like some other speakers I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand, good sound even some bass
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand, good sound even some bass, quick syncing, is large so be careful but overall one of the better choices. I am happy. Would get again.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sound ever for the money Thank you very much...
customer_reviews.author: joseph  Squillace

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for under 100
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are something I use everyday, the convenience is great. The blue tooth is easy to connect with your device (S3), along with the distance you can be from the device. The sound output is excellent and can easily put out more quality sound then an Ihome. Light weight and can travel easily. There is a USB port that allows charging for your device if needed. The rechargeable speakers do indeed last the time it says. Overall, these speakers are well worth the price if your looking for convenience and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of a beats wireless speaker for my son. The reviews were great and the product held up to the reviews. It has a better sound quality than beats and after one year it is still working great and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TLE

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound At An Unreal Price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker with incredible sound quality at this price point! Plugged in it's even louder than running on the battery solely but this puppy still kicks out absolutely phenomenal sound whether it's plugged in or not. The spatial sound enhancement feature allows you to adjust EQ to the room size and the bass production, especially from a fairly small unit, is something to behold. SONOS and Bose and JVC, whose speakers I compared this to, are great, but if you need an amazing, portable bluetooth speaker that will pair to your devices in no time and give you unbelievable sound quality, get the Sound Kick. You won't be disappointed. I'm certainly not, and I consider myself a music head.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great as a replacement for a table or kitchen radio.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with multiple users although you'll need to re-pair when changing. Sound quality is okay for size. Added USB port for power quite useful. Battery life usually not an issue. Reasonable price for quality. We got this because our radio reception is variable and we didn't want to have to install a separate streaming system. Running the Sound Freq off of a phone made great sense for us.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for my husband as his Christmas gift... and I'm the one who's using it! It delivers great sound and is so easy to set up. I recommend this for anyone looking for a portable speaker. The sound is amazing from such a small-medium sized product. Do you and your music a favor and buy one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: What A Kick!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, easy set up. Clear and full sound, not too bass heavy and significantly better than my GE Superradio lll. Excellent value at $100.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: This thing hits pretty hard, and as an Amazon warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: This thing hits pretty hard, and as an Amazon warehouse deal, you can't go wrong. Perfect for taking outside, to the beach, hotels, anything
customer_reviews.author: john B

customer_reviews.title: Compact with good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought another. Use them in my workshop take them to job sites and camping. Had to make my own car charger, used a old tablet charger and soldered on a 3.5mm jack. Have held up well to all the use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Evans

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: works perfect with my Google Nexus for playing music while on the deck, or watching videos on those rainy camping trips. Also can plug in the old Ipod as well. Last's a long time on a charge, great sound for a compact portable unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The Soundkick was shipped to me in Canada from the US in perfect condition within a week. The sound is very impressive, especially the bass response. Although it is not extremely loud it is crystal clear and can fill a large room with plenty of volume. Several of my colleagues were so impressed with it that they immediately wanted to know where to get it. I paid $153 including shipping and taxes, to my door in Canada. At less than half the price of the Bose, and, with better sound in my view, I think this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and plenty loud for me. It is not "boom-box" loud
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and plenty loud for me. It is not "boom-box" loud, but I don't play my music that loud anyway. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not many bluetooth speakers cost $100.00 USD new. This type won the "BEST" award in the price range.
customer_reviews.text: Soundfreaq sound kick has an unbelievable level and quality of sound. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-Compact Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works perfectly. The only place it could improve is battery life but even then the battery life is pretty good. The sound can get very loud, has good bass, and operates well for a Bluetooth speaker. This sounds better then the normal jawbone jambox to.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Irving

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: The Soundfreaq sounds like a more bigger speaker and is clear al crispy. The bass camera Works fine. Very happy with this "master piece"
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These Blue tooth speaker is absolutely wonderful and much cheaper than the Jambox and sounds just as good. If you are looking for a blue tooth speaker I definitely reccommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great links up easy and is loud enough to hear in other rooms Bluetooth works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Norton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my chef and he's used it every day without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Josh G

customer_reviews.title: kicks it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She digs it because it is easy to use, loud as crap and no need to plug it in to the source. All bluetooth baby!
customer_reviews.author: dashboardhula

customer_reviews.title: Bad charger......great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but charger was dead on arrival. Order replacement and found they have winced changed the type of charger included. Works and sounds great now.
customer_reviews.author: B. T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, the sound quality is wonderful, good bass response. Very happy with the product all the way around. even bought an after market car charger to keep with me, on the road. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with good sound and battery life. Range is better than expected - basically anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: T. Griebe

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I felt like it was a great value for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the sound quality and haven't had any technical ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars bc I'm comparing it to other items in its price range. I'm happy with the sound quality and haven't had any technical issues. Good product
customer_reviews.author: nk

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it loses sound volume once on battery power instead of electrically.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a portable speaker.. Well made and very good range. Have a friend with the Bose Soundlink and it blows it away in sound and range for a lot less $$$.
customer_reviews.author: rockout80

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but not as loud as I expected. Can't really fill a room.
customer_reviews.author: John G Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great quality, Best stereo sound I've heard in a portable player. You would expect this out of a large stereo or a Boom Box as we called them in the 80s. The soundfreq SFQ Sound Kick is compact/small with Big sound. I take it everywhere I go. Thanks.....
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Get IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my.....don't even worry about it. Great sound for such a little item! Bluetooth works amazing and haven't used without being plugged in yet, so cannot comment on battery, but EXTREMELY happy with this little gem.
customer_reviews.author: ca

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but definitely lacks bass
customer_reviews.text: I did not return this because we needed it for our business immediately. The Bluetooth is great but the sound of this speaker is just decent, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Cside

customer_reviews.title: Use this speaker daily. Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the bathroom & use it multiple times daily as we have different schedules. Puts out ample sound with good bass. Plan on getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: JP Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Almost 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Really decent sound and balance, etc. Good Looking Good Enough Battery Life for what I was expecting Cons: Sound Cuts out sporadically if you don't leave your iphone (5) sitting within a couple feet of the unit. (And then what is the point of bluetooth.) If the phone was in my pocket, the music would cut out for 1-3 seconds every 15 seconds or so Sound isn't really loud enough for outdoors Thanks for letting me return Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: but at the same time has really good sound quality at lower levels
customer_reviews.text: sound distorts a bit when volume is turned up very high, but at the same time has really good sound quality at lower levels.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Use the speaker everywhere-- indoors to lakeside on a dock. great sound and range from iPod. Would not hesitate to buy another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett88

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: It works great plugged in and in am enclosed room. It does not sound very loud unplugged or in a warehouse. I expected it to be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Tjt7wi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Great set of speakers. I love it. Small device with a great sound. I wish I would have bought this product a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad system
customer_reviews.text: It is not perfect but the general range of the sound is adequate. Could use a little better highs but the lows are nice.
customer_reviews.author: orion7x

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my girlfriend, and a year later I bought one for my sister. It produces quality sound, and is compact.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great bang (and bass) for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly rich and smooth sound for a unit at this price.The bass will rock you, Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: 00 Bluethooth sound system with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Do not spend time thinking too much: buy it if you want a U$ 100,00 Bluethooth sound system with great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Alves Rudow de Almeida

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely GREAT sound from this! Easy to charge, set up and use. So very glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: JennM

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it's not very loud when using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it's not very loud when using it in battery mode defeating the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Manichon

customer_reviews.title: We Really Like - albeit we are not audio pros
customer_reviews.text: we have a good Denon stereo with Polk speakers for living room, but use this to take to a small place to which we have access in the country. This is perfect to fill the place with good quality sound. Definition of fill and good could be up to date, but the i add value. This is $100, and I just guess they are not providing 60% better output. Only desire is that it be chargeable via USB - like all the phones and tablets streaming it bluetooth mp3. would be nice not to carry a small power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duke

customer_reviews.title: Compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Portable music with a good cost to quality sound. Well worth it. Somewhat compete able with the larger jawbone speaker set
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, connection doesn't drop
customer_reviews.text: Great product, connection doesn't drop, battery last at least 5 hrs. On one charge. Very good sound. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: slawomir tomczak

customer_reviews.title: great for small indoor places
customer_reviews.text: its great but not that loud! since my house is very small it does fine. but when I took to open spaces, it was just not enough...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker ever. I now own two.
customer_reviews.author: Tara777

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great, sound surprisingly good for its size. easy to set up and move around a built in radio would make this even better
customer_reviews.author: quanton

product_meta.title: Soundfreaq SFQ-04 Sound Kick Bluetooth speaker
product_meta.description: The SoundFreaq SFQ-04 Bluetooth rechargeable stereo speaker for wireless sound to any A2DP compatible device. Award-winning immersive stereo sound with UQ3 spatial enhancement technology makes this rechargeable speaker the perfect companion for your laptop, smartphone, iPod, iPad, MP3 player, or any other Bluetooth or wired device. Movies and music come alive with full clarity and volume on your portable device. An on-board USB port also provides optional 500mA charging while your device plays. A 3.5mm aux input jack allows for connecting wired devices as well. Includes an AC power cord and on-board touch controls.
feature_bullets: Rechargeable internal battery up to 7 hours play time
UQ3 spacial technology mode for expanded immersive sound
